db:abstract.db:para: The example shows how to use signals and slots to implement the functionality of a calculator widget, and how to use QGridLayout to place child widgets in a grid.

db:article.db:programlisting:
QT += widgets
HEADERS = button.h \ calculator.h SOURCES = button.cpp \ calculator.cpp \ main.cpp
# install target.path = $$[QT_INSTALL_EXAMPLES]/widgets/widgets/calculator INSTALLS += target
